name: BaloneyFactorFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Flash Briefing of the current Baloney Factor standings and changes. We calculate a number to indicate how full of baloney a candidate is. The lower the Baloney Factor, the better. Check out the details at https://www.wrfjs.org
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
